A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It wasn't as good as Empire\, but then again what is?

The outrage from the hardcore fans is almost understandable\, but reeks of neckbeards screeching that they didn't get exactly what they wanted.  Yes\, it breaks from canon (books and animated shows)\, but it does still have the "epic space opera" feel of the original trilogy.

Could some things have been done better?  Sure.  We all have our ideas of what would make the perfect Star Wars film.  Was it a good movie?  Yes.  Without a doubt it was.  

If you're thinking about seeing it\, ignore the cries of the people who only leave their parent's basement when a new Star Wars film comes out\, and go enjoy it.
